title: Jair Picerni
text:
Jair Picerni (born October 20, 1944) is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager and former player, who played as a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29%23Full-back">right back</a>.
With <a href="Associa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20Desportiva%20S%C3%A3o%20Caetano">São Caetano</a>, Picerni was twice runner-up of the <a href="Campeonato%20Brasileiro%20S%C3%A9rie%20A">Campeonato Brasileiro Série A</a> (<a href="Copa%20Jo%C3%A3o%20Havelange">2000</a> and <a href="Campeonato%20Brasileiro%20S%C3%A9rie%20A%202001">2001</a>) and a <a href="Copa%20Libertadores">Copa Libertadores</a> (<a href="Copa%20Libertadores%202002">2002</a>).
Honours.
São Caetano
Palmeiras
